issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When looking at cloud-output.log while investigating another issue I was seeing these WARN messages. To get to this state I had just created and deleted load balancers maybe 3 times. I can't say for sure when is first showed up.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.0
Release     : 0.0.747.20140326git7c137674.el6

Topology:
Edge Mode
\[CLC\]
\[UFS CC SC\]
\[NC\]

fields.summary: Load Balancer servo failed to remove IP address from the dns A record

comments.body: [~tony] to confirm, you didn't see it happening when you deleted the loadbalancer, right?
[~spark], I don't have this setup anymore but iirc, the message remained aven after all load balancers had been deleted.

Fix Verified

Did not get this error message with LB churn even using the same name for the loadbalancer and also fast churn of create/delete such as not waiting for servo instance to terminate.

Name : eucalyptus
Arch : x86_64
Version : 4.0.0
Release : 0.0.933.20140425git7b29dad4.el6

Name : eucalyptus-load-balancer-image
Arch : x86_64
Version : 1.0.4
Release : 0.197.140422git81659ff.el6
